    def lock
      if locked?
        Bundler.ui.info("The bundle is already locked, relocking.")
        remove_lockfiles
      end

      environment = Bundler.load
      environment.lock
    rescue GemNotFound, VersionConflict => e
      Bundler.ui.error(e.message)
      Bundler.ui.info "Run `bundle install` to install missing gems"
      exit 128
    end
